statements: SELECT * FROM location_data;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT location_id, visit_timestamp, customer_id FROM location_data ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(latitude), MAX(longitude) FROM location_data;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE customer_id = '1c24bcd9-1ea2-4f50-b0dc-6aa4c5b98b8e';
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE visit_timestamp >= '2022-03-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude, visit_timestamp FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 50 AND longitude BETWEEN -120 AND -100 ORDER BY visit_timestamp;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS visit_count FROM location_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY visit_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_data
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE visit_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -100
SELECT location_id, visit_timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE location_id = 10 AND visit_timestamp >= '2022-02-01'
SELECT geofence_data->>'coordinates' as coordinates FROM geofence_areas
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE visit_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_id, visit_timestamp FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT * FROM geofence_areas WHERE area_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT area_name, geofence_data FROM geofence_areas WHERE geofence_data ->> 'type' = 'circle';
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_name = 'New York';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT geofence_name, area FROM geofences WHERE area > 100 ORDER BY area ASC;
SELECT visit_timestamp FROM visits WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN -90 AND 90;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 35;
SELECT geofence_name AS name, area * 2 AS doubled_area FROM geofences;
SELECT * FROM visits ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_id, COUNT(customer_id) AS customer_count FROM visits GROUP BY location_id HAVING COUNT(customer_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_name, gender FROM visitors WHERE age > 30;
SELECT visit_date, visit_time FROM visits WHERE visitor_id = 5 ORDER BY visit_date ASC;
SELECT area_name, area_polygon FROM geofenced_areas;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT visitor_name, age, gender FROM visitors WHERE age > 25;
SELECT area_name, area_polygon FROM geofenced_areas WHERE area_id = 3;
SELECT visit_id, visit_date, visit_time, visitor_name FROM visits JOIN visitors ON visits.visitor_id = visitors.visitor_id ORDER BY visit_date ASC, visit_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT visit_id, visit_date, visit_time FROM Visits ORDER BY visit_date ASC, visit_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Locations WHERE latitude > 35.0 AND longitude < -90.0;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT visit_id, visit_date, visit_time FROM Visits ORDER BY visit_date DESC, visit_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT area_name, center_latitude, center_longitude, radius FROM GeofencedAreas WHERE radius >= 100.0;
SELECT va.analytics_id, va.visit_id, va.area_id, va.exit_time, g.center_latitude, g.center_longitude FROM VisitsAnalytics va JOIN GeofencedAreas g ON va.area_id = g.area_id WHERE va.dwell_time > 30;
